Detailed Description

Indicator that displays icon assigned for iterator values.

void IconValueIndicator::SetIcons (  const BitmapResArray *  icons,
UINT8  icon_count
) 
 

Sets the icons for this indicator. The icons are used for equal intervals in the range of the indicator. The first icon is used for the lowest, the last icon (icon_count -1) is used for the highest value.
